IX  LES PIGEONS DE DORDRECHT  --------------------- At the last minute the death sentence was commuted to imprisonment for life and Cornelius was taken directly from the scaffold to the state prison of Loewestein near Dordrecht. After several months of confinement at Loewestein, Cornelius caught and domesticated some pigeons that came from Dordrecht, and in that way sent a letter to his old nurse.
